statements: UPDATE waste_management_practices SET destination_name = 'Recycling Center', recycling_efforts = true WHERE destination_id = 1;
UPDATE waste_management_practices SET recycling_efforts = false, destination_name = 'Landfill' WHERE destination_id = 2;
UPDATE waste_management_practices SET destination_name = 'Recycling Center', recycling_efforts = TRUE WHERE destination_id = 1;
UPDATE waste_management_practices SET recycling_efforts = FALSE, destination_name = 'Landfill' WHERE destination_id = 2;
UPDATE waste_management_practices SET recycling_level = 2 WHERE destination_id = 1;
UPDATE waste_categories SET recycling_policy = 'Recycle all waste materials' WHERE category_id = 3;
UPDATE waste_management_practices SET recycling_level = 3, destination_name = 'Recycle Center' WHERE destination_id = 1;
UPDATE waste_categories SET category_name = 'Organic Waste', recycling_policy = 'Composting' WHERE category_id = 2;
UPDATE WasteManagementPractices SET recycling_program = 'Single Stream Recycling', waste_collection_schedule = 'Weekly Service' WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE RecyclingBins SET bin_capacity = 50, bin_status = 'Full' WHERE bin_id = 3;
UPDATE WasteManagementPractices SET recycling_program='Yes', waste_collection_schedule='Weekly' WHERE location_id=1;
UPDATE RecyclingBins SET bin_status='Full', bin_capacity=1000 WHERE bin_id=2;
UPDATE waste_management_destinations SET recycling_program = TRUE WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE waste_collection_points SET city = 'New York', capacity = 500 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE waste_management_destinations SET recycling_program = FALSE WHERE country = 'USA';
UPDATE waste_collection_points SET city = 'New York', capacity = 2000 WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE waste_management_sites SET location='New Location' WHERE site_id=1;
UPDATE recycling_bins SET waste_accepted='Plastic Bottles' WHERE bin_id=2;
UPDATE waste_management_sites SET location = 'New City Recycling Center' WHERE site_id = 1;
UPDATE recycling_bins SET waste_accepted = 'Plastic, Glass, Paper' WHERE bin_id = 3;
